Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththiranaagiya Nee Ippodhu Theeruvinperile Pulambi,

3 samuththirak Karaithuraiyile Kudiyirundhu Anegam Theevugalin Janangalode Vyaabaarampannugira Theeruvai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Theeruve, Nee Unnaip Pooranasowndhariyavadhi Engiraai.
4 kadalgalin Nadumaiyaththile Unthaabaram Irukkiradhu; Unnaik Kattinavargal Unnaip Pooranavadivaaik Kattinaargal.
5 seneerilirundhu Vandha Dhevadhaaru Maraththaal Un Kappar Palagaigalai Seydhaargal; Paaimarangalai Seyyumpadikku Leebanonilirundhu Kedhurumarangalaik Konduvandhaargal.
6 paasaanin Karvaalimarangalinaale Un Thuduppugalai Seydhaargal; Kiththeem Theevugalilirundhu Vandha Aashoor Maraththaal Un Vaaripalagaigalai Seydhu, Adhile Yaanaiththandham Azhuththiyirundhaargal.
7 egipthilirundhu Vandha Siththiraththaiyalulla Sanalnool Pudavai Nee Viriththa Paayaayirundhadhu; Eleesaa Theevugalin Ilaneelamum Raththaambaramum Un Vidhaanamaayirundhadhu.
8 seedhon Arvaadh Ennum Pattanangalin Kudigal Unakkuth Thanduvalikkiravargalaayirundhaargal. Theeruve, Unnidaththilirundha Un Saasthirigal Un Maalumigalaayirundhaargal.

9 kebaarin Mudhiyorum Adhin Saasthirigalum Unnil Kambaththuppaarkkiravargalaayirundhaargal; Samuththiraththin Sagala Kappalgalum Avaigalilulla Kapparkaararum Unnode Thozhilthurai Vyaabaaram Pannugiradharkaaga Unnidaththil Irundhaargal.
10 persiyarum, Loodhiyarum, Pooththiyarum Un Raanuvaththil Yuththaveeraraayirundhu Unakkul Kedagamum Thalaichcheeraavum Thookkivaiththu, Unnai Alangariththaargal.

11 arvaadh Puththirarum Un Raanuva Manusharum Un Madhilgalmel Sutrilum, Gammaaththiyar Un Koththalangalilum Irundhaargal; Ivargal Un Madhilgalmel Sutrilum Thangal Parisaigalaith Thookkivaiththu, Un Vadivaththaip Pooranappaduththinaargal.
12 sagalavidha Porulgalin Thiralinaalum Tharshees Ooraar Unnode Viyaabaarampanninaargal; Velliyaiyum Irumbaiyum Thagaraththaiyum Eeyaththaiyum Un Sandhaigalil Virka Vandhaargal.
13 yaavaan, Thoobaal, Mesek Ennum Jaadhiyaar Un Viyaabaarigalaayirundhu, Manushargalaiyum Vengalappaaththirangalaiyum Un Thozhilthuraikkuk Konduvandhaargal.
14 thogarmaa Vamsaththaar Kudhiraigalaiyum Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Koverukazhudhaigalaiyum Un Sandhaigalukkuk Konduvandhaargal.

15 thedhaan Puththirar Un Viyaabaarigalaayirundhaargal; Anegam Theevugalin Varththagam Un Vasamaaga Serndhadhu; Yaanaiththanthangalaiyum Karungaali Marangalaiyum Avaigalukkup Padhilaagak Konduvandhaargal.

16 seeriyar Un Velaippaadaana Parpala Porulgalinimiththam Unnode Viyaabaarampanni, Maragadhangalaiyum, Raththaambarangalaiyum, Siththiraththaiyalaadaigalaiyum, Uyarndha Vasthirangalaiyum, Pavalangalaiyum, Palingaiyum Un Sandhaigalil Virkavandhaargal.
17 yoodharum Isravel Dhesaththaarum Unnode Viyaabaarampanni, Minneedh Pannaak Engira Oorgalin Kodhumaiyaiyum, Thenaiyum, Enneyaiyum, Pisinthailaththaiyum Un Thozhilthuraikkuk Konduvandhaargal.

18 thamasku Un Velaippaadaana Parpala Porulgalinimiththamum, Sagalavidhap Porulgalin Thiratchiyinimiththamum Unnode Varththagampanni, Kelponin Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Venmaiyaana Aattumayiraiyum Unakku Vitraargal.
19 thaan Naattaarum, Pokkumvaraththumaana Yaavaanarum Thulakkappatta Irumbaiyum Lavangaththaiyum Vasambaiyum Un Sandhaigalil Konduvandhu Un Thozhilthuraiyil Vitraargal.
20 radhangalukkup Podugira Menmaiyaana Raththinakkambalangalai Thedhaanin Manushar Konduvandhu, Unnode Viyaabaarampanninaargal.
21 arabiyarum, Kedhaarin Sagala Prabukkalum Unakku Vaadikkaiyaana Varththagaraagi Aattukkuttigalaiyum Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyum Konduvandhu, Unnode Viyaabaarampanninaargal.
22 sebaa, Raamaa Pattanangalin Viyaabaarigal Unnode Varththagampanni, Meltharamaana Sagalavidha Sambaarangalaiyum, Sagalavidha Raththinakkarkalaiyum, Ponnaiyum Un Sandhaigalil Konduvandhaargal.
23 aaraan, Kanne, Edhen Ennum Pattanaththaarum, Sebaavin Viyaabaarigalum Aseeriyarum, Kilmaadh Pattanaththaarum Unnode Viyaabaarampanninaargal.

24 ivargal Sagalavidha Uyarndha Sarakkugalaiyum, Ilaneelap Pattugalum Visiththiraththaiyalaadaigalum Adangiya Pudavaikkattugalaiyum, Vilai Uyarndha Vasthirangal Vaikkappattu Kayirugalaal Kattiyirukkum Kedhurumarappettigalaiyum Konduvandhu, Unnode Viyaabaarampanninaargal.
25 un Thozhilthuraiyil Tharsheesin Kappalaatkal Unnaip Potrip Paadinaargal; Nee Samuththiraththin Naduvile Unnaip Pooranappaduththi Unnai Migavum Magimaippaduththinaai.
26 thanduvalikkiravargal Aazhamaana Thanneergalil Unnai Valiththukkondu Ponaargal; Naduchchamuththiraththile Kondarkaatru Unnai Udaiththuppottadhu.

27 nee Naasamadaiyum Naalile Un Aasthiyodum, Un Sandhaigalodum, Un Thozhilthuraiyodunkooda Un Kappalaatkalum Un Maalumigalum Unnil Kambaththuppaarkkiravargalum, Un Viyaabaarigalum Unnilulla Ellaa Yuththaveerarum, Un Naduvilirukkira Ellaakkoottaththaarum Naduchchamuththiraththile Vizhuvaargal.
28 un Maalumigal Olamidum Saththaththinaal Sutruppurangal Adhirum.
29 thanduvalikkira Yaavarum, Kappalaatkalum, Kadal Maalumigal Anaivarum, Thangal Kappalgalai Vittu Irangi, Karaiyile Nindru,
30 unnimiththam Saththamittuppulambi, Manankasandhu Azhudhu, Thangal Thalaigalinmel Puzhudhiyaip Pottukkondu, Saambalil Purandu,
31 unakkaaga Mottaiyittu Rattuduththikkondu, Unakkaaga Manankasandhu Azhudhu, Dhukkankondaaduvaargal.
32 avargal Unakkaagath Thangal Dhukkaththile Olamittu, Unnimiththam Pulambi, Unnaikkuriththu: Samuththiraththin Naduvile Azhindhupona Theeruvukku Samaana Nagaram Undo?

33 un Sandhaichcharakkugal Samuththirangal Vazhiyaaik Konduvarappadugaiyil, Anega Janangalaith Thirupthiyaakkinaai; Un Aasthiyin Thiralinaalum Un Viyaabaaraththinaalum Boomiyin Raajaakkalai Aisuvariyavaangalaakkinaai.
34 nee Samuththirath Thiraigalinaale Aazhangalil Udaikkappattapodhu, Un Thozhil Thuraiyum Un Naduvilulla Koottam Anaiththum Azhindhupoyina Enbaargal.
35 theevugalin Kudigal Ellaam Unnimiththam Thigaippaargal; Avargaludaiya Raajaakkal Migavum Bramiththu, Kalangina Mugamaayiruppaargal.
36 sagala Janangalilumulla Varththagar Unperil Eesalpoduvaargal; Nee Bayangaramaavaai; Ini Orupodhum Irukkamaattaai Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
